item.title: By: John
item.dc:creator: John
item.description: I notice in fig. 3 that the shading for surfaces is piecewise constant. Is it possible to have the shading be continuously varying in height? (First time poster but I've admired your posts for many many years. Thank you!)
item.content:encoded: I notice in fig. 3 that the shading for surfaces is piecewise constant. Is it possible to have the shading be continuously varying in height? (First time poster but I’ve admired your posts for many many years. Thank you!)
